groups.label: Inline Code Detection
groups.description: Configure detection of inline codes and tags

assumeWellformed.description: Assume input HTML is well-formed XML. Faster but may fail on non-conforming HTML.

extractOuterStrings.description: Extract text outside of HTML body tags.

preserveWhitespace.description: Preserve all whitespace exactly as in source.

collapseWhitespace.description: Collapse multiple whitespace characters into single space.

trimLeadingWS.description: Remove leading whitespace from text segments.

trimTrailingWS.description: Remove trailing whitespace from text segments.

useCodeFinder.description: Enable inline code detection using regex patterns.

mergeAdjacentCodes.description: Merge adjacent inline codes into a single code element for cleaner segmentation.

moveLeadingAndTrailingCodesToSkeleton.description: Move inline codes at the start/end of segments to skeleton (non-translatable).

extractMetaDescription.description: Extract content from meta description tag.

excludeElements.description: Comma-separated list of elements to exclude from extraction.

translatableAttributes.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to extract for translation.

idAttributes.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to use as IDs.
